class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 18 - July 30, 2022. Apply online at studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: The study of Britain's contribution to the understanding of Economics, and its own economic system through organized talks, site visits, career and networking opportunities in London, England.
prerequisites: (ECON 101 or ECON_OX 101) and (ECON 112 or ECON_OX 112) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 2237, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: D. Jacho-Chavez, Status: Open
